questions.text: How many years had it been since Rebecca had last seen her friend?
questions.explanation:
18.

	When she said to Carla, "You'll never guess who that was", Carla replied, "Your dental hygienist?" Carla informed her she didn't care.

questions.text: Where did Rebecca first meet her friend Mark Newberger?
questions.explanation:
A production of "The Bad Seed".

	Rebecca said that Mark was her first boyfriend. She then went on to say that he was the only man she really loved.

It was stolen.

	A policeman brought Sam into the bar after finding him just staring at a parking spot. Sam told Frasier, "I left it outside, what was I thinking?"

Harvey Fierstein.

	Fierstein was born June 6, 1954 in Brooklyn, NY. He is a playwright as well as an actor. In 1984, he won the Tony Award for Best Book of a Musical for "La Cage Aux Folles".

questions.text: What did Rebecca not realize about Mark?
questions.explanation:
He's gay.

	All the others realized it. Rebecca thought she was going to marry Mark.

questions.text: What did Sam keep saying at the support group?
questions.explanation:
Yeah, that's me.

	First the woman said she felt like an "empty like a crock-pot". Then Kirby said he could see his car out of the corner of his eye. Both times Sam said, "Yeah, that's me."

questions.text: Did Sam get his car back?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Woody told Sam the police called and found his car. Sam abruptly ended the support group meeting to go get his own car.

questions.text: When Mark said to Rebecca, "You know I'm gay don't you", how did Rebecca respond?
options: You've got to be kidding me!
questions.explanation:
Well of course I do.

	She had planned a romantic date with him. Then when she was coming on to him, he told her. She was embarrassed so she acted like she knew.

questions.text: What did Rebecca think caused Mark to be gay?
options: It was a lie to get out of dating her.
questions.explanation:
She put him off women.

	Mark told her that it was not true, and it confused him because she was the only female he'd ever been attracted to.  She told him that she'd been told before that a guy became gay because of her.
